Инструкции по работе с программами электронной подписи и шифрования
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications

How to work with digital signature and encryption applications
How to work with digital signature and encryption applications

Уникальное представление сертификата используется в полях выбора при подписании и шифровании. Оно формируется из фамилии, имени, организации, должности и срока действия. Например: "Иванов Иван, ООО 1С, Программист, до 03.2017".
Когда у пользователя два сертификата от разных удостоверяющих центров (УЦ), тогда представление нужно дополнить именем УЦ. Например: "Иванов Иван, ООО 1С, Программист, до 03.2017, УЦ 1С".
Когда сертификат используется для специальной цели разными пользователями, тогда представление нужно заменить на описание этой цели, например: "Для подписания счетов-фактур, до 05.2019", "Для подписания налоговой отчетности, до 12.2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certification authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".

Уточняет, что пароль к закрытому ключу сертификата будет вводиться в отдельном окне программой электронной подписи и шифрования, а не программой 1С:Предприятие.
Только для сертификатов, которые выпущены с усиленной защитой закрытого ключа.

Specifies that the password for certificate private key will be entered in separate window by digital signature and encryption application, not 1C:Enterprise.
Only for certificates issued with strong private key protection.

Запомнить пароль сертификата до закрытия программы. При снятии флажка пароль стирается из памяти, если запоминался ранее.
Remember certificate password before closing the application. When the check box is cleared, the password is erased from memory if it was remembered earlier.

Пароль запрашивает программа электронной подписи, а не программа 1С:Предприятие, так как для выбранного сертификата указана усиленная защита закрытого ключа.
Password is requested by the digital signature application, not by 1C:Enterprise as strong private key protection is specified for the selected certificate.
